Articles.Content:
I just Installed this mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35043-1-0-X-Experimental-On-Hold-FusTek-Station-Parts-%28WIPs-on-GitHub%29

and im trying to build a station with it, I got a hub and two habitats into orbit it crew, but i dont know how to transfer the crew

The mod required ship manifest and connected living space so how do i use those? I attached the 3 modules via connected docking ports in the vab and have opened them but it says the modules are not part of the same living space and the habitats dont have eva hatches

TL;DR How do you use connected living spaces and ship manifest?

Edited October 28, 2015 by Claw

That question is probably better asked in the mod thread for Ship Manifest.

In fact, the very first post of that thread includes a link to a full-blown wiki that provides documentation for all of the features. That should help to get you started.

If you have issues linking parts together into the same living space, then Connected Living Space also has its own thread in the mod section of the forums.

Ok, Thanks
